responses: 100: Term length is explicitly unlimited or the life of the office holder.
citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
notes: Changes to term lengths are recorded as occurring on the date that a new constitution or constitutional amendment takes force, or, if unavailable, date of promulgation.
question: What is the maximum term length of the head of government?
name: v2exfxtmhg
